data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Hiroshima, Japan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hiroshima, Japan

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Hiroshima to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Hiroshima to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Hiroshima.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Persian people.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Hiroshima, Japan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Hiroshima, Japan.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hiroshima, Japan has a population of 2,858,000.

We estimate Hiroshima has 16,182 people who might know Jesus, 45,632 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,796,186 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 16,182 believers in Hiroshima to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
